description: "ViLe" Hackers Busted! Two men plead guilty to breaching a federal law enforcement portal.  Learn about the dangers of cybercrime, doxxing, and how authorities are working to combat these threats. This case highlights the importance of cybersecurity for law enforcement and the consequences for online criminals.
title: ViLe Cybercrime Group Members Plead Guilty to Hacking DEA Portal

description: Sophon and Aethir have announced the beginning of a strategic collaboration between the two networks, connecting the 800,000…
title: Sophon and Aethir Partner to Bring Decentralized Compute to The ZK Community

description: Critical security vulnerabilities (CVE-2024-37079, CVE-2024-37080, CVE-2024-37081) found in VMware vCenter Server! Patch immediately to safeguard virtual environments from remote code execution & privilege escalation attacks.
title: Broadcom Advises Urgent Patch for Severe VMware vCenter Server Vulnerabilities

description: Notorious hacker IntelBroker claims to have breached Apple, stealing source code for internal tools. Learn about the alleged breach and IntelBroker's history of targeting major companies and government entities.
title: IntelBroker Hacker Claims Apple Breach, Steals Source Code for Internal Tools

description: Discover how China-linked Velvet Ant APT exploited F5 BIG-IP devices for years undetected. Sygnia's detailed analysis exposes tactics used to maintain persistence and evade detection, offering crucial insights for organizations to bolster their cybersecurity defenses against similar threats.
title: Chinese Velvet Ant Hackers Target F5 Devices in Years-Long Espionage
